items.text: A prime number is like a superhero number; it stands alone and can't be made by multiplying smaller numbers together!
Composite numbers are like team players; they can be formed by multiplying smaller numbers together, just like a team working together!
Every number greater than 1 is either a lone wolf (prime) or can be built using a special recipe of superhero numbers (primes)!
